price: Woi ne Nyankopͻn ahyεdeε a Wasiane ama mo. Na obia ͻbɛsuro Nyankopͻn no Ɔbεpepa ne bͻne afiri ne so, na Wama n’akatua ayε kεse ama no.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ أَنزَلَهُۥٓ إِلَيۡكُمۡۚ وَمَن يَتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِۦ وَيُعۡظِمۡ لَهُۥٓ أَجۡرًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika amru al-lahi anzalahu ilaykum waman yattaqi al-laha yukaffir ʿanhu sayyiātihi wayuʿ'ẓim lahu ajran
